location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Oliver St. John, Shiraz to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a forthcoming trip to Teheran [Tehran], a recommended route to take and a map of the route (which is not included with the letter).The letter also includes a brief update on matters in Shiraz including news of the Cherry and Mulberry Crops.The letter is written on paper with the St. John family crest and is dated 21 May, but no year is given.
